name: PettaPuggo 1.1 (Unstable)
description:
Completed in 48 hours!

Meet Puggo! You have been tasked with keeping Puggo happy, pet him as much as you can to score points!

Little known fact about Pugs... Quite often their silly little skulls are too small for their eyes and if they get too excited they can accidentally eject them... I wouldn't recommend a google search but I ain't your Mother...

In PettaPuggo you will have to balance fussin' Puggo with fixing his eyes if they come out to try and keep him happy.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

This is my second ever game and it was definitely alot of fun to put together. I was really worried about the 48 hour time limit but it turned out to be a pretty good motivator! Excited to make the next one.
